text: Jisasɨlɨn kavik galaveve, “Yila faklian ŋakɨk wulu yive suwapa. Yetɨk balañjɨkɨn kavik tonmale fak ŋakɨk wulu ga valambalen, wun yakai yakai vaŋ tonapa. Yila balañjun wandefaka katɨk balañjɨk yetɨk gasak mɨndɨm wokok bɨŋbatɨk dɨŋmakandi gia maŋamguanɨk yukuakɨ ga ŋɨlɨwalen, valan anafak pava wunutuk. Ŋɨlɨwale fulakɨn yakai yakai vaŋ gaveka. Yetɨk balañɨkɨn safakliak pave ŋunu ga valambalen, ŋɨn yakakatɨk vaŋ wunutuk papa.
